title: Ramp Riot 111
brief_description: Watch the rad action of the world’s best skaters in “Ramp Riot 111” held at Festival Hall, Melbourne, in November 1989. Chris Miller, Jeff Phillips and Bod Boyle from the USA, battle the top Aussie skaters, Gary Valentine, Adam Luxford, Jason Ellis, Tony Hallam and Lee Ralph. This program highlights the unreal action from this event, including footage never seen before which was actually shot from inside the ramp.
